description: If you are a Star Trek fan then I think you will find this documentary interesting. This is mainly 75 Shatner + Nimoy discussing various aspects of the original series and their private lives how they related to the show.
keywords: star trek,friendship between men,reference to star trek,behind the scenes
name: Mind Meld: Secrets Behind the Voyage of a Lifetime

original_info.id: Mind Meld: Secrets Behind the Voyage of a Lifetime_2001
original_info.name: Mind Meld: Secrets Behind the Voyage of a Lifetime

review.name: Enjoyable conversation with 2 TV icons.
review.reviewBody:
I am a huge fan of Star Trek the original series.If you are not, you will likely find this documentary pretty boring and a bit pointless.

This is more about Shatner and Nemoy and their personal life and outlooks and how star trek effected them.. then actually about star trek the TV show.It is well done and very interesting,and we get a glimpse of the inside of Nemoys home.

The DVD has a few nice extras on it including "the making of"

Worth watching if you like this sort of thing,and you definitely learn a thing or two about the pair, ex specially Nemoy,he seems more open and sincere.

Well made.
